DOC.brief_summary: The investigator assess whether Bushenyi District southwestern Uganda , two year intervention provide comprehensive MNCH programming : - Reduce morbidity mortality child five year old ; - Improve access maternal health service Compared control community without MNCH intervention ? Hypothesis : Comprehensive maternal , newborn child health program Bushenyi Distrcit positive impact morbidity mortality child five year improve access woman maternal health service may lead , long term , decrease maternal mortality .
DOC.brief_title: MNCH Programming Southwest Uganda Maternal Child Health In Bushenyi Rubirizi Districts , UGANDA
DOC.detailed_description: A detailed impact assessment carry duration MNCH train support initiative Bushenyi District , use mixed method . The study assess 8 11 key core MNCH indicator identify CIDA priority . Other information collect demographic pattern health care use , prevalence disease help health planner district , helpful sub analysis interpretation finding . The main study use household survey district baseline , midline endline . Other tool include pre post qualitative survey ( FGDs , KII ) analysis operational data . The main study group representative community health centre within Bushenyi District receive intervention 2012 2014 ; Rubirizi District serve control area study receive select MNCH service start 2013 midline data collect .
DOC.criteria: household live selected community ; woman 1549 live select community none
